summary: A team of military field operatives and civilian scientists must use untested technology to travel back in time to alter past events in order to change the future and avoid a devastating terrorist attack.
cast: Shane McRae|Jennifer Ferrin|Robbie Jones|Keon Alexander|Keisha Castle-Hughes|Jeff Fahey|Kenneth Welsh|Matthew Bennett|Paulino Nunes|Melanie Scrofano|David Cronenberg|James Downing|Jim Codrington|Joanne Reece|Rosemary Dunsmore|Robert B. Kennedy|Jamaal Grant|Chris Violette|Kristi Angus|Chris Ratz|Skyler Wexler|Lada Darewych|Kelly Jones|Matthieu Disna|Marsha Clark
keywords: time machine|time travel|time travel agency|unsold tv series pilot
title: Rewind
